verses.verse: And Joshua <WH3091> gathered <WH622> all the tribes <WH7626> of Israel <WH3478> to Shechem <WH7927>, and called <WH7121> for the elders <WH2205> of Israel <WH3478>, and for their heads <WH7218>, and for their judges <WH8199>, and for their officers <WH7860>; and they presented <WH3320> themselves before <WH6440> God <WH430>.

And Joshua <WH3091> said <WH559> unto all the people <WH5971>, Thus saith <WH559> Jehovah <WH3068>, the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>, Your fathers <WH1> dwelt <WH3427> of old time <WH5769> beyond <WH5676> the River <WH5104>, even Terah <WH8646>, the father <WH1> of Abraham <WH85>, and the father <WH1> of Nahor <WH5152>: and they served <WH5647> other <WH312> gods <WH430>.

And I took <WH3947> your father <WH1> Abraham <WH85> from beyond <WH5676> the River <WH5104>, and led <WH3212> him throughout all the land <WH776> of Canaan <WH3667>, and multiplied <WH7235> his seed <WH2233>, and gave <WH5414> him Isaac <WH3327>.

And I gave <WH5414> unto Isaac <WH3327> Jacob <WH3290> and Esau <WH6215>: and I gave <WH5414> unto Esau <WH6215> mount <WH2022> Seir <WH8165>, to possess <WH3423> it <WH3290>: and Jacob and his children <WH1121> went down <WH3381> into Egypt <WH4714>.

And I sent <WH7971> Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175>, and I plagued <WH5062> Egypt <WH4714>, according to that which <WH834> I did <WH6213> in the midst <WH7130> thereof <WH310>: and afterward I brought you out <WH3318>.

And I brought <WH3318> your fathers <WH1> out of Egypt <WH4714>: and ye came <WH935> unto the sea <WH3220>; and the Egyptians <WH4714> pursued <WH7291> after <WH310> your fathers <WH1> with chariots <WH7393> and with horsemen <WH6571> unto the Red <WH5488> Sea <WH3220>.

And when they cried <WH6817> out unto Jehovah <WH3068>, he put <WH7760> darkness <WH3990> between you and the Egyptians <WH4713>, and brought <WH935> the sea <WH3220> upon them <WH3680>, and covered them <WH5869>; and your eyes saw <WH7200> what I did <WH6213> in Egypt <WH4714>: and ye dwelt <WH3427> in the wilderness <WH4057> many <WH7227> days <WH3117>.

And I brought <WH935> you into the land <WH776> of the Amorites <WH567>, that dwelt <WH3427> beyond <WH5676> the Jordan <WH3383>: and they fought <WH3898> with you <WH5414>; and I gave them into your hand <WH3027>, and ye possessed <WH3423> their land <WH776>; and I destroyed <WH8045> them from before you <WH6440>.

Then Balak <WH1111> the son <WH1121> of Zippor <WH6834>, king <WH4428> of Moab <WH4124>, arose <WH6965> and fought <WH3898> against Israel <WH3478>: and he sent <WH7971> and called <WH7121> Balaam <WH1109> the son <WH1121> of Beor <WH1160> to curse you <WH7043>;
but I would <WH14> not hearken <WH8085> unto Balaam <WH1109>; therefore he blessed <WH1288> you still <WH1288>: so I delivered <WH5337> you out of his hand <WH3027>.

And ye went over <WH5674> the Jordan <WH3383>, and came <WH935> unto Jericho <WH3405>: and the men <WH1167> of Jericho <WH3405> fought <WH3898> against you <WH567>, the Amorite, and the Perizzite <WH6522>, and the Canaanite <WH3669>, and the Hittite <WH2850>, and the Girgashite <WH1622>, the Hivite <WH2340>, and the Jebusite <WH2983>; and I delivered <WH5414> them into your hand <WH3027>.

And I sent <WH7971> the hornet <WH6880> before <WH6440> you <WH1644>, which drove them out from before <WH6440> you <WH8147>, even the two kings <WH4428> of the Amorites <WH567>; not with thy sword <WH2719>, nor with thy bow <WH7198>.

And I gave <WH5414> you a land <WH776> whereon thou hadst not labored <WH3021>, and cities <WH5892> which ye built <WH1129> not <WH3427>, and ye dwell therein <WH3754>; of vineyards and oliveyards <WH2132> which ye planted <WH5193> not do ye eat <WH398>.

Now therefore fear <WH3372> Jehovah <WH3068>, and serve <WH5647> him in sincerity <WH8549> and in truth <WH571>; and put away <WH5493> the gods <WH430> which your fathers <WH1> served <WH5647> beyond <WH5676> the River <WH5104>, and in Egypt <WH4714>; and serve <WH5647> ye Jehovah <WH3068>.

And if it seem evil <WH7489> unto you <WH4310> to serve <WH5647> Jehovah <WH3068>, choose <WH977> you this day <WH3117> whom <WH5869> ye will serve <WH5647>; whether the gods <WH430> which your fathers <WH1> served <WH5647> that were beyond <WH5676> the River <WH5104>, or the gods <WH430> of the Amorites <WH567>, in whose land <WH776> ye dwell <WH3427>: but as for me and my house <WH1004>, we will serve <WH5647> Jehovah <WH3068>.
And the people <WH5971> answered <WH6030> and said <WH559>, Far <WH2486> be it from us that we should forsake <WH5800> Jehovah <WH3068>, to serve <WH5647> other <WH312> gods <WH430>;

for Jehovah <WH3068> our God <WH430>, he it is that brought us and our fathers <WH1> up <WH5927> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, from the house <WH1004> of bondage <WH5650>, and that did <WH6213> those great <WH1419> signs <WH226> in our sight <WH5869>, and preserved <WH8104> us in all the way <WH1870> wherein we went <WH1980>, and among all the peoples <WH5971> through <WH7130> the midst of whom we passed <WH5674>;

and Jehovah <WH3068> drove out <WH1644> from before <WH6440> us all the peoples <WH5971>, even the Amorites <WH567> that dwelt <WH3427> in the land <WH776>: therefore we also will serve <WH5647> Jehovah <WH3068>; for he is our God <WH430>.

And Joshua <WH3091> said <WH559> unto the people <WH5971>, Ye cannot <WH3201> serve <WH5647> Jehovah <WH3068>; for he is a holy <WH6918> God <WH430>; he is a jealous <WH7072> God <WH430>; he will not forgive <WH5375> your transgression <WH6588> nor your sins <WH2403>.

If ye forsake <WH5800> Jehovah <WH3068>, and serve <WH5647> foreign <WH5236> gods <WH430>, then he will turn <WH7725> and do you evil <WH7489>, and consume <WH3615> you <WH310>, after that he hath done you good <WH3190>.
And the people <WH5971> said <WH559> unto Joshua <WH3091>, Nay <WH5647>; but we will serve Jehovah <WH3068>.

And Joshua <WH3091> said <WH559> unto the people <WH5971>, Ye are witnesses <WH5707> against yourselves that ye have chosen <WH977> you Jehovah <WH3068>, to serve <WH5647> him <WH559>. And they said, We are witnesses <WH5707>.

Now therefore put away <WH5493>, said he <WH5236>, the foreign gods <WH430> which are among <WH7130> you <WH5186>, and incline your heart <WH3824> unto Jehovah <WH3068>, the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>.
And the people <WH5971> said <WH559> unto Joshua <WH3091>, Jehovah <WH3068> our God <WH430> will we serve <WH5647>, and unto his voice <WH6963> will we hearken <WH8085>.
So Joshua <WH3091> made <WH3772> a covenant <WH1285> with the people <WH5971> that day <WH3117>, and set <WH7760> them a statute <WH2706> and an ordinance <WH4941> in Shechem <WH7927>.

And Joshua <WH3091> wrote <WH3789> these words <WH1697> in the book <WH5612> of the law <WH8451> of God <WH430>; and he took <WH3947> a great <WH1419> stone <WH68>, and set it up <WH6965> there under the oak <WH427> that was by the sanctuary <WH4720> of Jehovah <WH3068>.

And Joshua <WH3091> said <WH559> unto all the people <WH5971>, Behold <WH68>, this stone shall be a witness <WH5713> against us <WH8085>; for it hath heard all the words <WH561> of Jehovah <WH3068> which he spake <WH1696> unto us <WH5713>: it shall be therefore a witness against you <WH3584>, lest ye deny your God <WH430>.
So Joshua <WH3091> sent the people <WH5971> away <WH7971>, every man <WH376> unto his inheritance <WH5159>.

And it came to pass after <WH310> these things <WH1697>, that Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126>, the servant <WH5650> of Jehovah <WH3068>, died <WH4191>, being a hundred <WH3967> and ten <WH6235> years <WH8141> old <WH1121>.

And they buried <WH6912> him in the border <WH1366> of his inheritance <WH5159> in Timnathserah <WH8556>, which is in the hill-country <WH2022> of Ephraim <WH669>, on the north <WH6828> of the mountain <WH2022> of Gaash <WH1608>.

And Israel <WH3478> served <WH5647> Jehovah <WH3068> all the days <WH3117> of Joshua <WH3091>, and all the days <WH3117> of the elders <WH2205> that outlived <WH3117> Joshua <WH3091>, and had known <WH3045> all the work <WH4639> of Jehovah <WH3068>, that he had wrought <WH6213> for Israel <WH3478>.

And the bones <WH6106> of Joseph <WH3130>, which the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> brought up <WH5927> out of Egypt <WH4714>, buried <WH6912> they in Shechem <WH7927>, in the parcel <WH2513> of ground <WH7704> which Jacob <WH3290> bought <WH7069> of the sons <WH1121> of Hamor <WH2544> the father <WH1> of Shechem <WH7927> for a hundred <WH3967> pieces of money <WH7192>: and they became the inheritance <WH5159> of the children <WH1121> of Joseph <WH3130>.

And Eleazar <WH499> the son <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175> died <WH4191>; and they buried <WH6912> him in the hill <WH1389> of Phinehas <WH6372> his son <WH1121>, which was given <WH5414> him in the hill-country <WH2022> of Ephraim <WH669>.
